definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: Detects and deletes malwares and other unknown threats.
sentences.chinese: 檢測並刪除惡意軟件和其他未知的威脅。

sentences.english: Malwares represent a big threat to the shifting of software services online.
sentences.chinese: 衆多惡意軟件表明一個巨大的威脅轉向在線軟件服務。

sentences.english: Jesper Johansson's excellent article called "Anatomy of a malware scam."
sentences.chinese: 文章的題目叫做“惡意軟件欺詐解剖”。

sentences.english: But, the most darkling change still is the origin problem of baleful software.
sentences.chinese: 但是，最令人害怕的變化還是惡意軟件的來源問題。

sentences.english: Of rubbish mail put in, also be the contribution of baleful software.
sentences.chinese: 垃圾郵件的投放，也是惡意軟件的功勞。

sentences.english: Badware can even add desktop shortcuts to your PC.
sentences.chinese: 惡意軟件甚至可以添加桌面快捷方式到您的PC。

sentences.english: Software companies that sell Mac anti-malware utilities like to chime in regularly.
sentences.chinese: 軟件公司銷售蘋果的反惡意軟件工具要定期磬。

sentences.english: But I don't just want to rant at commercial anti-malware companies.
sentences.chinese: 我並非要大聲責難商業反惡意軟件公司。

sentences.english: What exactly are phishing and malware attacks?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，網絡釣魚與惡意軟件攻擊究竟是什麼？

sentences.english: How much will my malware detection improve with Artemis ?
sentences.chinese: 有多少我的惡意軟件檢測改善與阿耳特彌斯？

sentences.english: Malware Catch-all term applied to malicious forms of software that are created to disrupt operating systems.
sentences.chinese: 惡意軟件的關鍵作用就是去摧毀操作系統。

sentences.english: The malware creator can also take complete remote control of any compromised machine.
sentences.chinese: 惡意軟件作者也可以完成遠程控制機器的任何損害。

sentences.english: The self-protection in Anti-Malware 5 has been greatly optimized.
sentences.chinese: 自我在反惡意軟件5保護已大大優化。

sentences.english: But unlike most malware, it seemed to be doing little harm.
sentences.chinese: 但它和其他大多數惡意軟件不同，它似乎危害性很小。

sentences.english: Phone companies and service providers are scrambling to block mobile malware.
sentences.chinese: 電話公司和服務提供商正在努力堵截手機惡意軟件。

sentences.english: And malicious software could corrupt or erase files on the external drive.
sentences.chinese: 一些惡意軟件可能會毀壞或刪除外置硬盤上的文件。

definition: subprime mortgage crisis/abbr. for 次級房屋信貸危機|次级房屋信贷危机[ci4 ji2 fang2 wu1 xin4 dai4 wei1 ji1]
